title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the options to open and close the project are not consistently available.
EB: The options to open and close the project should be consistently available when selecting both P1 and P2.
SR:
1. Launch the application
2. Navigate to the Navigator section
3. Select both P1 and P2
4. Observe the availability of the options to open and close the project
